entry.title: undefined
entry.content:
• 1 3 ounce package of cream cheese
  • 1 cup margarine
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla
  • 2 cups confectioner’s sugar

Cream together softened cream cheese and margarine. Stir in vanilla. Add sugar in small amounts and beat until smooth.

entry.title: undefined
entry.content:
Crust

Ingredients

  • 3 cups flour

  • 1 1/2 cup butter

  • 3/4 cup powdered sugar

Directions

Sift flour and sugar into bowl. Blend in butter with fingertips until well mixed. Pat evenly into a baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes at 350°F. Prepare filling.

Filling

Ingredients

  • 6 eggs
  • 3 cups granulated sugar
  • 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
  • 7 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice
  • dash of salt

Directions

Pour over baked crust and return to oven for 20 − 25 minutes at same temperature (350°F). Cool on rack. Cut in squares. Sprinkle with sifted powdered sugar.

entry.title: undefined
entry.content:
Ingredients

  • 4 eggs
  • 1 2/3 cup sugar
  • 1 cup cooking oil
  • 1 16 ounce can pumpkin
  • 2 cups flour
  • 2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 2 teaspoon cinnamon
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda

Directions

Mix all ingredients together until well blended. Spread mixture on well-greased jelly roll pan, or cookie sheet with sides. Bake about 25–30 minutes at 350°F. Let cool. Spread cream cheese frosting on top.
